title: P&G\'s Native Personal Care Formulas Boast Girl Scout Cookie Scents
text: 12.28.23 Native, the "clean" personal care brand "At Native, we pride ourselves on delighting our consumers with something unexpected yet craveable,” said Vineet Kumar, CEO of Native. “We are so excited to partner with Girl Scouts to transform its iconic cookie flavors into scents for our clean, simple and effective collection of products.” The new products are inspired by some of the most popular Girl Scout cookie flavors: Caramel Coconut - This oh-so-sweet scent of caramel, coconut and chocolate cookies is a true delight, according to Trefoils - Inspired by the original Girl Scout cookie recipe, this shortbread scent blends notes of vanilla, lemon and buttercream. Available in deodorant and body wash. Peanut Butter - A medley of peanut butter, vanilla and brown sugar scents. Available in deodorant and body wash. Lemon -This refreshing shortbread scent melds with tangy lemon to create a delicious mix. Available in deodorant and deodorant & body spray. Thin Mints - A vibrant blend of mint and chocolate scents to refresh your senses. Available in body wash, shampoo, conditioner and 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner. “Seeing our cookies inspire an entire line of personal care products is really exciting,” said Wendy Lou, chief revenue officer at GSUSA. “These products are a fun twist on ways folks can enjoy the scents of our beloved cookie flavors.” Regular, sensitive and plastic free deodorants retail for $13, Deodorant & body spray retail for $14, Body wash retails for $9, 2-in-1 shampoo & conditioner retails for $10 and shampoo & conditioner will each retail for $10. The collection launches exclusively on Native’s [owned](https://www.happi.com/contents/view_breaking-news/2017-11-15/pg-buys-natural-deodorant-start-up/)by [Procter & Gamble](https://www.happi.com/heaps/view/11582/1/485385), launched a limited-edition collection, inspired by some of the most popular [Girl Scout Cookies](http://www.girlscouts.org). The collection includes deodorant, deodorant & body spray, body wash, shampoo and conditioner in a variety of cookie-inspired scents.
